author: cms-sw
body:
Setup `CMSSW_15_1_FASTPU_X` IB with following configurations
- Uses special `CMSSW_15_1_FASTPU_X` branch of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw
  - Automatic forward port changes from `CMSSW_15_1_X` in to `CMSSW_15_1_FASTPU_X`
- Build only for production architecture i.e. `el8_amd64_gcc12`
  - Build only for default microarch i.e. `x86-64-v3`
- Uses same externals as `CMSSW_15_1_X` default IB
- Build every day for `23h00` only
title: Added CMSSW_15_1_FASTPU_X IB for fast Pileup tests
